author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest trailer for Black Torch! The anime series releases July 2026!

#IGN #Anime
title: Black Torch - Official Release Window Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
When reclusive novelist Ohm Bauman (Scott) retreats to a remote Irish inn to scatter his parents’ ashes, the staff’s tales of an ancient witch haunting the honeymoon suite take hold of his mind. Soon, disturbing visions and a shocking disappearance draw him into a nightmarish confrontation with the darkest corners of his past.

#IGN #Movies
title: HOKUM - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Adam Scott

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Casey Hudson, director of the just-announced Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic, is assuring fans that the game will be out before 2030. This comes after some on social media are guessing the game won't be about until then, which isn't too wild of a guess considering Hudson's new studio was just formed this past summer, and the long development times of Triple-A games these days. There's also the KOTOR remake, which was announced in 2021 and has seemingly been stuck in development hell since then. In other news, Larian Studios just dropped a new update for console versions of Divinity: Original Sin 2. The game is now optimized for PS5 and Xbox Series consoles, as well as Nintendo Switch 2. The next game in the series, titled Divinity, was just announced at least week's Game Awards. And speaking of, Phantom Blade Zero made a splash at The Game Awards with a new trailer, but if you're an Xbox or Nintendo fan, don't expect the game to launch side-by-side with the P
title: Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic Director Says It Will Launch Before 2030 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Watch the final trailer for The Housemaid, an upcoming thriller film starring Sydney Sweeney and Amanda Seyfried, based on the best-selling book. The film also stars Brandon Sklenar, Michele Morrone, and Elizabeth Perkins. The Housemaid opens in theaters on December 19, 2025.

From director Paul Feig, the film plunges audiences into a twisted world where perfection is an illusion, and nothing is as it seems. Trying to escape her past, Millie (Sweeney) accepts a job as a live-in housemaid for the wealthy Nina (Seyfried) and Andrew Winchester (Brandon Sklenar). But what begins as a dream job quickly unravels into something far more dangerous — a sexy, seductive game of secrets, scandal, and power. Behind the Winchesters’ closed doors lies a world of shocking twists that will leave you guessing until the very end.
title: The Housemaid - Official Final Trailer (2025) Sydney Sweeney, Amanda Seyfried

author: IGN
description:
Sanctuary burns. Evil stirs. Heroes fought, but the hatred only grow stronger. Get caught up on the story of Diablo 4 in this latest trailer for the action RPG ahead of the launch of the Diablo 4: Lord of Hatred expansion. Diablo 4: Lord of Hatred will be available on PC, Xbox, PlayStation 4 (PS4), and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on April 28, 2026.

In Diablo 4, the battle for survival began. In Vessel of Hatred, Neyrelle’s journey descends into obsession and forbidden power. Every choice brings Sanctuary closer to the edge. 

And yet… the worst is still to come. The Lord of Hatred awakens. The next chapter of darkness is inevitable.

Will you stand against it… or be consumed?
title: Diablo 4: Lord of Hatred - Official 'The Story So Far' Trailer (Warning: Spoilers)

author: IGN
description:
Cult of the Lamb gets a new trailer and a release date for the Woolhaven update. Watch the latest Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven trailer for the roguelite action game for another look at the upcoming woolhaven expansion, which brings new dungeons, buildings, weapons, characters, quests and systems. The new ranching system lets you tame, ride and – if times get tough – eat a whole menagerie of majestic beasts. Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One on January 22, 2026.

Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven picks up where the original game's main story left off. In Woolhaven, an unexpected calling from a forgotten God takes you on a perilous new adventure across a distant mountain to the titular Woolhaven, ancestral home of the Lambs.

Yngya, the God of Winter, unleashes frost and snow across the land, making keeping your flock safe, warm, fed and watered the greatest – and most rewarding – challe
title: Cult of the Lamb - Official Woolhaven Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: SHADE Protocol is a 2D cyber-fantasy Metroidvania where music, code, and combat collide. Swap between DAWN and SHADE forms to unleash devastating abilities, wield Instruments as weapons, and rewrite reality itself in a world on the brink of annihilation by the SHADE Protocol. Watch the latest SHADE Protocol trailer to see gameplay and more. SHADE Protocol will be available on PC, and a Kickstarter campaign is out now. You can learn more about SHADE Protocol on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3581730/SHADE_Protocol/
title: SHADE Protocol - Official Kickstarter Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase TGA Edition 2025

author: IGN
description: We sat down with Blizzard president Johanna Faries and Diablo 4 game director Brent Gibson moments before The Game Awards to discuss the just-announced Lord of Hatred expansion pack, the upcoming 30th anniversary of Diablo and 35th anniversary of Blizzard, how Blizzard currently thinks about new IP vs. their established properties, and more!
title: Blizzard President and Diablo 4 Director Talk Lord of Hatred, Diablo Anniversary, and More

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Sanctuary of Sarras DLC Launch Trailer for Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon, a dark fantasy action-adventure open-world RPG developed by Questline. Players can now access fresh content in a new realm shaped by the deep sea with new characters, dungeons, weapons, and more to take on larger-than-life bosses among the suite of enemies. The Sanctuary of Sarras DLC for Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ign #gaming
title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon - Official Sanctuary of Sarras DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
This espionage thriller series follows first-generation Chinese-American intelligence analyst Alexander Hale (Simu Liu) who realizes his brain has been hacked, giving the perpetrators access to everything he sees and hears. Caught between his shadowy agency and the unknown hackers, he must maintain a performance 24/7 to flush out who’s responsible and prove where his allegiance lies. 

The series is executive produced by James Wan (The Conjuring Universe, M3GAN) and in addition to Simu Liu, stars Melissa Barrera (In the Heights, Scream V and VI), Sinclair Daniel (The Other Black Girl, Insidious: The Red Door), Brian d’Arcy James (Spotlight, 13 Reasons Why), Mark O’Brien (City on a Hill, Ready or Not) and Kathleen Chalfant (Wit, The Affair).

All episodes of The Copenhagen Test premiere Saturday, December 27, only on Peacock.
title: The Copenhagen Test: Exclusive Clip (2025) Simu Liu, Saul Rubinek

author: IGN
description:
From sentient lighthouses to capitalists in space, these were the best Xbox games of 2025. There have been hits from Xbox Game Studios, great day-one third-party launches on Xbox Game Pass, and no shortage of great games to celebrate. What was your favourite Xbox game of 2025? Let us know in the comments, and be sure to keep an eye out for our picks for the best PlayStation and Nintendo games of the year.

#IGN #GameOfTheYear2025 #2025Gaming
title: The Best Xbox Game of 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Graft trailer for this upcoming post-cyperpunk survival horror RPG from developer Harebrained Schemes (makers of BATTLETECH, the Shadow Run Trilogy, and the Lamplighters League). The new Graft trailer shows brutal gameplay and more of its terrifying world. Graft will be available on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

Blending classic survival horror combat with a visceral twist, Graft allows you to take on nightmarish creatures and transform yourself into something new—something capable of surviving the horrors that prowl around you. Tear pieces from your enemies to unlock deadly tools to expand your arsenal, but there’s a catch: every Graft carries with it some small piece of its previous owner… and now they are all a part of you. Navigate the fragments and reshape to survive.

#IGN #Graft #Horror
title: Graft - Official 'Inosculation' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join star Doug Bradley (voice of Pinhead) and members of the development team for a behind-the-scenes look at the story, inspiration, and more from the upcoming survival-horror action game, Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival. Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam in 2026.

Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival delivers a totally new Hellraiser story starring Aidan, who is on a journey to save his girlfriend from Hell and the realm of terrors ahead. Using the dark powers of the Genesis Configuration puzzle box, unlock mysterious powers as you face dark cultist worshippers, sex-crazed deviants, and infernal monstrosities. Arm yourself with various jaw-dropping weapons - some cruel, some strangely fun - but will it be enough to spare you from an eternity of torment?

#IGN #HellraiserRevival #Horror
title: Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival - Official 'The Vision' Developer Diary Video

author: IGN
description:
OX’s Jane and Andy must make use of the capital’s transport network to get from Westminster to The Shard as quickly as possible, while IGN duo Alex and Nash race in-game, navigating the maps of Watch Dogs Legion and Assassin’s Creed Syndicate. But both pairs will have to deal with tasks and hurdles designed to level the playing field. Who will triumph in this test of skill, connectivity and (broadband) speed? Sponsored by EE

author: IGN
description:
Divinity: Original Sin 2 is available now on Nintendo Switch 2, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5). You can upgrade for free or begin your adventure today and prepare for what lies ahead. Watch the Divinity: Original Sin 2: Definitive Edition launch trailer for this complete version of the RPG from the creators of Baldur’s Gate 3. 

The Divine is dead. The Void approaches. And the powers lying dormant within you are soon to awaken. Choose your role in a BAFTA-winning story, and explore a world that reacts to who you are, and the choices you make. With five races to choose from, and an adventure playable solo or as a party of up to four, lay waste to an oppressive order in a world afraid of magic. Become the God the world so desperately needs.

#IGN #DivinityOriginalSin2 #RPG
title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Official Nintendo Switch 2, Xbox Series X/S, & PS5 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the teaser trailer for Normal, an upcoming movie starring Bob Odenkirk, Henry Winkler and Lena Headey.

For Sheriff Ulysses (Odenkirk), his provisional posting to the quaint Midwestern American town of Normal was meant to be a welcome respite from both his marital woes and recent moral injuries in the line of duty. But when a botched bank robbery interrupts the municipality’s tranquil pace, a dark secret is inadvertently exposed, and Ulysses soon discovers that the town is anything but its namesake.

The latest collaboration between Bob Odenkirk, John Wick creator Derek Kolstad and Nobody producer Marc Provissiero, director Ben Wheatley’s (Free Fire, High Rise) kinetic neo-Western stars Odenkirk as an unassuming substitute sheriff with a troubled past who, after moving to a small, sleepy town, responds to a bank robbery and unknowingly uncovers something far more explosive.

Normal is produced by Marc Provissiero, Bob Odenkirk, and Derek Kolstad in partnership with QWGmire. Moll
title: Normal - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Bob Odenkirk, Henry Winkler, Lena Headey

author: IGN
description:
Mighty foes from the Demon Realm await… and they won’t go down easy. Watch the Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 2 trailer to see what's coming when Part 2 launches early 2026.

#IGN #DragonBallZKakarot #Action
title: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 2 - Official Battle Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Celebrate the season with Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2's Winter Holiday Update. Watch the latest Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 for the action RPG to see what to expect with the Winter Holiday update, which brings several customization options and custom difficulty settings, including an FOV slider, motion blur toggle and choosing to play as only Phyre or Fabien. Step into the World of Darkness as the elder vampire Phyre and Malkavian detective Fabien. Unravel mysteries, manoeuvre Kindred politics, and confront the blurred line between truth and delusion in the Winter Holiday Update. Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is now available on Steam, Epic, GoG, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

Awaken from a century-long slumber as the Nomad, an elder vampire new to the modern nights, in Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, where visceral vampire action meets a neo-noir murder mystery. Navigate the vampire court of Seattle and its dark secrets in this actio
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - Official Winter Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Supreme Experiment, a first-person sci-fi action-adventure game developed by Argunov Games. Players will find themselves in a world overrun by machines that have evolved beyond the need for humans and into a brand-new species with their own gods. Leave the high-towering cities where what's left of humanity resides and descend into the world after the machines fall silent. Survive, explore, and fight to uncover a deep truth and save what remains of humanity in Supreme Experiment, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Supreme Experiment - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a deeper look at the gameplay in EverSiege: Untold Ages, the upcoming fantasy hero-driven strategy roguelite that can be played solo or with up to three friends in co-op. Check out the playable demo on Steam right now ahead of its February 3, 2026 release on PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3363680/EverSiege_Untold_Ages/
title: EverSiege: Untold Ages - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest ARC Raiders trailer for the third-person action extraction shooter game to see what to expect with the Flickering Flames Winter Event, which brings the Cold Snap map condition, new set: Misthorn, a new Raider Deck: Goalie, Candleberry Banquet winter project, more quests, and the Expedition window opens. 

Below ground, the tenacity of the human spirit endures. Despite food scarcity and rolling blackouts, survivors gather to light candles, swap war stories, and appreciate what little they have, together. The Flickering Flames Winter Event for ARC Raiders begins December 16, 2025.

#IGN #ARCRaiders #ExtractionShooter
title: ARC Raiders - Official 'Flickering Flames Winter Event' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Pax Autocratica gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Watch the Pax Autocratica release date trailer for this upcoming roguelite colony sim to see action-packed gameplay and more. In Pax Autocratica, shape a grand colony where every life bends to your will. Feel the weight of absolute power as you decree laws, then lead your squads in roguelite FPS battles from brutal skirmishes to large-scale battlefields and unite the Tyris System under your banner. Pax Autocratica will be available on PC via Steam on February 2, 2026. Learn more about Pax Autocratica and wishlist on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1067360/Pax_Autocratica/

#IGN #gaming
title: Pax Autocratica - Official Release Date Trailer
